title: What are the 3 things you learned from the book On Fire: The 7 Choices to Ignite a Radically Inspired Life by the author John O’Leary? - Quora

response.answer_text: (1) CONSISTENCY The most Powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire - Marshal Ferdinand foch (1st Chapter of book starts with this quote) For me this fire is CONSISTENCY during achieving your Goal. It could be Cracking Some Exam, loosing/gaining weight but whatever it is, There will be a resistance. Motivation plays role of SPARK but after that you have to Keep That Fire On for the long term. (During achieving your goal). →So to be Consistent One must keep That FIRE “ON”.🌻🌺🌺🌺🌻 (2) GRATEFUL “I used to love taking a bath. Now it’s the worst part of my day.” (At age of 9 Author was burned severely, So when he was in hospital every drop of water was hurting him.) Here one can feel we must feel grateful for what we have. We must spare some time to thank God for all the Resources we have. Many times we take things for granted but when we lose the same we feel the importance of those things. No matter how bad life may seem, if there is life there is hope.—STEPHEN HAWKING ( Quote from chapter no. 4) →So Be Grateful🌻🌻 (3) DREAM The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but has no vision. —Helen Keller (Quote from Chapter 5) Author Survived Through his 100 percent burn, Because of his Surrounding, His Siblings, Parents and all the people were optimistic they successfully Convinced Author that he will survive. ❤ It was hard to stand up, It was hard to walk,🏃 It was hard to write,🖋 But despite all of this he recovered and became SUCCESSFUL Person Who is now Improving Living Standards of other people, Who is inspiring everyone with his Kind Words. So Dream and take action to fulfil it. 🎯 🌷🌸🌸Thank you, Have a nice day 🌸🌸🌷
